description:
NOTE: We recommend playing this in true full-screen by clicking the blue <-> button to the bottom right of the game window.

Known issues:

  • It is sometimes not possible to close the clipboard after opening it. Sorry. :( We'll have a fix for this shortly!
  • There's an issue with the font rendering where text sometimes doesn't show up on overlaid UI canvases. If you don't see a list of names on the clipboard, try reloading, and sorry for this! If you do find a blank screen the checkboxes in order are: Figg. Harrington. McClaw. Scud.

---

The Rise of Colour

A game made for the Community Game Jam 2019. Theme: The game is a liar.

Who stole the painting? Why did they do it? How was it done? Put on your finest detective hat and get ready to scan some witness testimonies. Always remember that you are the face of justice, and that the time draws near.

Design and Programming: Benjamin Nolan
Design, Story and odd art: Katie Bennie of Walrusware
Character Art: Steven Liu(Lemonthunder)
Background Art: Nathan Wong (thelogicmatrix)
